alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 8:15PM CST until January 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Sheridan, Garden, Grant and Arthur Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of very cold air and strong winds will create dangerously low wind chill values. This will result in frostbite and lead to hypothermia or death if precautions are not taken.
